scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:client: echo 'Starting build:client...' && echo 'Current directory:' && pwd && echo 'Listing contents:' && ls -la && echo 'Checking client directory:' && ls -la client/ && echo 'Checking client package.json:' && cat client/package.json | grep -A5 -B5 vercel-build && echo 'Changing to client directory...' && cd client && echo 'Client directory contents:' && ls -la && echo 'Running vercel-build...' && npm run vercel-build
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
